verses.name: Numbers 7:47
verses.text: And for a sacrifice of peace offerings, two oxen, five rams, five he goats, five lambs of the first year: this was the offering of Eliasaph the son of Deuel.

verses.name: Numbers 7:48
verses.text: On the seventh day Elishama the son of Ammihud, prince of the children of Ephraim, offered:

verses.name: Numbers 7:49
verses.text: His offering was one silver charger, the weight whereof was an hundred and thirty shekels, one silver bowl of seventy shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary; both of them full of fine flour mingled with oil for a meat offering:

verses.name: Numbers 7:50
verses.text: One golden spoon of ten shekels, full of incense:
